mapper.select: SELECT test_no testNo, lecture_no lectureNo, test_startdate testStartdate, test_enddate testEnddate, test_content testContent, test_createdate testCreatedate FROM test WHERE lecture_no = #{lectureNo} ORDER BY test_createdate DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM test WHERE lecture_no = #{lectureNo}

SELECT m.multiplechoice_no, m.test_no, m.multiplechoice_id, m.multiplechoice_question, m.multiplechoice_answer, m.multiplechoice_createdate, m.multiplechoice_score, me.multiplechoice_no, me.multiplechoice_example_no, me.multiplechoice_example_id, me.multiplechoice_example_content FROM multiplechoice m LEFT JOIN multiplechoice_example me ON m.multiplechoice_no = me.multiplechoice_no WHERE m.test_no = #{testNo} ORDER BY m.multiplechoice_no ASC, me.multiplechoice_example_no ASC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM multiplechoice m LEFT JOIN multiplechoice_example me ON m.multiplechoice_no = me.multiplechoice_no WHERE m.test_no = #{testNo}
